name: 視訊通訊
goals: Build theoretical concepts of Video Communication
Understand current situation in the market of Video Communication
Build ability to implement application of video communication
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週】  
Week 1 – Course introduction: goals and requirements  
Week 2 – Introduction  
Week 3 – Basic digital video coding and its applications in communication  
Week 4 – Compression fundamental  
Week 5 – International still image coding standard  
Week 6 – Motion estimation/compression and hybrid coding system (1/2)  
Week 7 – Motion estimation/compression and hybrid coding system (2/2)  
Week 8 – Discussion: midterm project  
Week 9 – H.264 video coding standards (1/2)  
Week 10 – H.264 video coding standards (2/2)  
Week 11 – Scalable video coding (1/2)  
Week 12 – Scalable video coding (2/2)  
Week 13 – Digital video communication and error concealment/resilience  
Week 14 – Digital video transcoding  
Week 15 – Discussion: current research topics  
Week 16 – Final exam  
Week 17 – Self-directed learning  
Week 18 – Self-directed learning

methodologies.note: 講解視訊通訊之原理、歷史與未來發展及相關應用。
以專題報告方式進行專業知識討論與交流。
以程式實作方式了解視訊通訊之原理及應用。

grading.note: 課程專業知識之期末測驗。
課程專業知識之口頭報告。

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
